text: Bayonne ham () is a type of ham from the French commune of Bayonne. It is made by curing the pork with a special type of salt from the commune of Salies-de- BÃ©arn. It currently has protected designation of origin. The meat can only come from a special breed of pigs from small farms. == References == Category:Ham Category:French food Category:Bayonne
title: Bayonne ham
